mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart (cartid, userid, itemcode, quantity) values (seq_cart.nextval, #{userID}, #{itemCode}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by cart.cartID desc) as num, cart.cartID, cart.userID, cart.itemCode, cart.quantity, cart.addDate, item.itemName, item.price, item.thumbnail from tbl_cart cart inner join tbl_item item on cart.itemCode = item.itemCode where cart.userID = #{userID}
mapper.update: update tbl_cart set quantity=#{quantity} where cartid =#{cartID}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_cart where itemCode = #{itemCode} and userID = #{userID}
